com.atmecs.falcon.automation.db.service.db.nosql.mongo

Interface MongoService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoDBTemplate

    public interface MongoService
    MongoService Interface describes common MongoDB Services with CRUD Operations
    Author:
    nv092106

      • storeFileWithDocument

        boolean storeFileWithDocument(java.io.File file,
                              java.lang.Object obj)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        PURPOSE: Store File in the collection named with fs.files. File would be stored in binary format embedding with the given Object as Metadata.
        Parameters:
        file - is the File to be uploaded to the Database
        obj - to be stored as metadata along with the File
        Returns:
        the true value for successful Operation
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
